This place is nice with a perfect ambiance for a romantic dinner.  The quality of the seafood is fresh but the reason why I give it 3 stars was due to the saltiness of all the food.  We tried the black noodle with cuttlefish,  black rice with cuttlefish,  meat paella,  seafood noddle,  and meat and vegetable paella.  On the contrary,  the cod fish and salmon was good.
